attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Time to end the unjust embargoes against the people of North Cyprus 


For 41 years, the international community ignored the plight of Turkish Cypriots 
Their existence 'erased' from the world map 
Their lives embargoed, forcing them to live like second class-citizens in their homeland 
We say no more! 


This petition is dedicated to the 220,000+ people of North Cyprus and their equivalent numbers abroad whose lives have been oppressed by 41 years of international isolation.

We hope that by giving you a window into their ‘invisible world’, you will better understand their plight and support the campaign for the immediate and unconditional end to these embargoes.

We want the world to reconise that in the years between 1963-1974 in Cyprus the turkish cypriot were victim of genocide.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
